underlying_goal: Migrate and organize ~/.claude/ global config into a project home folder (~/claude/) with bare git tracking, symlinks/copies, and auto-sync scripts for full CLI runtime state capture
friction_detail: Claude repeatedly jumped into brute-force tool usage without thinking, broke hard links with Write instead of in-place edits, misunderstood symlink direction, botched gitignore patterns, and deleted existing config entries without reason â€” requiring constant user correction.
brief_summary: User wanted to migrate ~/.claude/ config into a tracked project folder with bare git repo, sync scripts, and symlinks/copies; achieved after significant friction from Claude's repeated missteps with symlinks, gitignore, and file operations.
